abstract: UBS has been hired to help China’s largest oil and gas group, PetroChina, raise up to $6 billion in what will be one of the biggest listings on the country’s mainland market. The Financial Times said that the deal highlights UBS’s determination to grab a big slice of the Chinese public offerings market.
lead_paragraph: UBS has been hired to help China’s largest oil and gas group, PetroChina, raise up to $6 billion in what will be one of the biggest listings on the country’s mainland market. The Financial Times said that the deal highlights UBS’s determination to grab a big slice of the Chinese public offerings market.

headline.main: UBS To Help PetroChina Raise $6 Billion in I.P.O.
